comments.body: Proposing the license file be added to the manifest in PR ( https://github.com/landscapeio/pylint-celery/pull/3 ). May need to resolve this in the feedstock.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +33,37 @@about:
  home: https://github.com/landscapeio/pylint-celery
  license: GPL 2
  summary: 'pylint-celery is a Pylint plugin to aid Pylint in recognising and understandingerrors caused when using the Celery library'
